channel.title: How to use tamper data to change highscores
channel.description:
imjohn10's guide on how to use tamper data to edit scores.....
what you need 1)firefox [url=http://www.mozilla-europe.org/en/products/firefox/]download here[/url] 2)tamper data [url=https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/addon/966]download here[/url]
1)find a game. im using [url=http://www.shockarcade.com/index.php?mod=play&sub=shock-defence]shock defence[/url]
2)play the game till game over...
[IMG]http://i118.photobucket.com/albums/o105/santaselfboy/1-4.jpg[/img]
3)then start tamper data and then click start tamper.
[IMG]http://i118.photobucket.com/albums/o105/santaselfboy/2-4.jpg[/img]
4)then press the submit button on the game.
[IMG]http://i118.photobucket.com/albums/o105/santaselfboy/5-3.jpg[/img]
5)go back to tamper data and click tamper.
[IMG]http://i118.photobucket.com/albums/o105/santaselfboy/3-4.jpg[/img]
6)a new window should appear, change the score on the right to what you want it to be.
[IMG]http://i118.photobucket.com/albums/o105/santaselfboy/4-4.jpg[/img]
7)click ok and also click stop tamper.
8)your done.

item.description:
@Westside_Rep wrote:

[quote=“1337h4x, post:4, topic:110174”]Bitch stole my nick. This would be WAY easier to just do it yourself.[/quote] Tamper Data Is meant to use with games like these. if you’re talking about using wpe pro or CE, Or TSearch or w/e this would not really work with those. Take the advice from a 1337 hacker. =P

item.title: How to use tamper data to change highscores
item.dc:creator: @imjohn10 imjohn10
item.description:
@imjohn10 wrote:

imjohn10’s guide on how to use tamper data to edit scores…

what you need
1)firefox download here
2)tamper data download here

1)find a game. im using shock defence

2)play the game till game over…

3)then start tamper data and then click start tamper.

2-4.jpg798×525

4)then press the submit button on the game.

5)go back to tamper data and click tamper.

3-4.jpg798×256

6)a new window should appear, change the score on the right to what you want it to be.

7)click ok and also click stop tamper.

8)your done.

Read full topic
item.source: How to use tamper data to change highscores
